TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted, but it's all neo-cubist bieber portraits.

I wish for a wish that DOES NOT have a cruel twist.

Granted. It has a bunch of legal text instead.

I wish for a lawyer.

Granted, but you get into trouble with the police and he fails you at your trial.

Edit: I hope they keep the edits on the KSP forum...

Granted, but there are no more original posts.

I wish for a competent lawyer.

Granted, but he's eaten by a T-Rex while using an outhouse.

I wish for an indominous rex.

Granted, but he gets dominated.

I wish for a competent lawyer who is not food.

Then he is a pile of dirt and cannot help you in any way.

I wish for enough money for a cubesat...

Granted, but you can't reserve space on a launch.

I wish for a sentient, competent, non-food lawyer.

Granted, but you then have hundreds of X-boxes that you need to get rid of but can't because everyone else has many.

I wish for something good.

Granted. You get to watch me enjoy this sandwich. This perfect sandwich. With perfect crispness and intoxicating aroma. You get to watch me savour every bite of this sandwich as your lips water while wanting to take a bite of this sandwich, and when you ask I will tell you, soundly, no... this is MY sandwich which you wished for me.

I wish it was legal to hit pedestrians that are more interested in status updates than the cars driving straight at him/her

Granted, but you're more interested in KSP forumposts and the guy who hits you gets away scot-free.

I wish for world peace and some reputation.

Granted... every human on earth dies leaving no one to fight over anything... no one except you, now you have a reputation as a planet killer

I wish people would realize more megapixels = worse camera. It isn't like they ever post those 20Mpx photos, and compressed photos (a la jpeg) don't do justice.

Granted, but everything becomes -20 megapixels to compensate, leaving you with less than nothing.

I wish for a pile of free cheese.

Granted, you get a pile of toe cheese

I wish the number war was more exciting

Granted, but you need to reach a 1,000,000 or -1,000,000 to win.

I wish for more good things to happen.

Granted, but even more bad things happen to compensate.

I wish for Hyperedit And MechJeb

granted they both pale in comparisonn to nasas flight control and hyper edit cause a paradox good job

i wish the world was 2d

Granted, but computers become 2d, causing you to NEVER PLAY KSP AGAIN!

I wish for a chance to meet Randall Munroe

- - - Updated - - -

http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Randall_Munroe

Granted. He throws his "What-If" book at you at 0.9c, destroying you and the surrounding city blocks.

I wish for a car.

Granted. You'd like that expensive exotic car with the leather seats right? And all those self driving features too? Well, you can have my old Plymouth Fury, her name's Christine and she loves you.

I wish the next person to wish for something will die a horrible death

Granted, but that was you reading what you just wrote.

I wish for a shot of tequila.

Granted, but it's mint and peach.

I wish for the combined powers of every superhero (Including Goku) and/or awesome fictional character.

Congrats, you now can pull your own arms off and weld strays to people.

I wish for good things to happen.

Granted. Small pox is released at every major human city, billions die... but problems such as poverty, economic inequality, and starvation have been eradicated.

I wish people would corrupt my "next poster" wishes in a sensible manner.
